definition: accord/to make contact/to agree/to consult with/extensive

sentences.english: For assistance please call the Library Circulation Desk at extension 15112.
sentences.chinese: 若有疑问欢迎洽询图书馆出纳台，分机15112。

sentences.english: Ask your administrator for supported search bases.
sentences.chinese: 请洽询管理员，了解支援的搜寻基础。

sentences.english: Ask your system administrator what port you should specify.
sentences.chinese: 请洽询您的系统管理员，了解您应该指定的埠。

sentences.english: Consult a doctor or health practitioner who has experience with fasting.
sentences.chinese: 请洽询有绝食经验的医生或顾问。

sentences.english: Please consult your physician for advice.
If interested, please speak to the front desk.
For further details, apply to this office.
If you still receive this message, contactyournetwork administrator.
sentences.chinese: 如果依然接收到此消息，请洽询网络管理员。

sentences.english: Please approach to the library if any doubt occurred.
sentences.chinese: 如有任何疑问，欢迎洽询本馆。

definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
to match up (employers and jobseekers, men and women seeking a partner, blind people and guide dogs etc)
variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
